description:
In "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of Viviter where you can play with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Bull Bull Swing" mini-game!
Oh no! The ball is over there!
That dog looks so ferocious. It's impossible to approach normally.
Don't worry, Bear Jim. Leave it to me.
I'll use the swing to get close quickly and snatch the ball back in a flash.
name: Additional mini-game "Bull Bull Swing"
